data.eml:eml: A revision of the genus Muricea Lamouroux, 1821 (Anthozoa, Octocorallia) in the eastern Pacific. Part II

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Breedy, Odalisca, Guzman, Hector M. (2016): A revision of the genus Muricea Lamouroux, 1821 (Anthozoa, Octocorallia) in the eastern Pacific. Part II. ZooKeys 581: 1-69, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.581.7910, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.581.7910
